name: Crypt of Greed
description:
WASD or Arrows to move

There have been countless legends told of the Crypt of Greed and the vast riches that can be found in the deepest bowels of its halls. You have come seeking the great fortune, but woe to the traveller who possess greed of their own in abundance, for they may never see the light of day ever again. Do you have the skills to persevere? Or will your nature be your own undoing...

To descend in the crypt, you'll need to bring an offering of coins to the altar. Every coin you pick will make you slower, and depositing them will lighten your load. You'll also need to bring the key found in each floor to the altar. Once you bring the key to the altar, all coins on the floor will be worth double! Once you've collected what you need you can return to the portal and go to the next floor. However, the more items you bring to the altar, the angrier and quicker the greedy spirit will be...

Feedback is greatly appreciated!
